questions.quote: Do you think this is such a good idea, with you being on the verge of this big promotion?
Ugh. So now we have to rearrange our lives to avoid the doorman?
Hold on. Hold on. Wait a minute. How am I gonna get the rye bread into the apartment?
Radar detector? I've never seen you go over twenty miles an hour. You're like the Grand Marshall of the Rose Bowl Parade. It's a Wizard organizer.
So you're telling me instead of them being happy to see me, they're going to be upset because I didn't bring anything. Ttst --You see what I'm saying?
See those wrinkled jeans slung over the chair? Way in the background, out of focus?
I can't. He's been on my case about not paying attention. Besides, it's too late, I already told him I heard him.
Oh, yes, he's very proud of his work in the big game. So you've never uh, met him before?
Oh, don't worry. I'm gonna show you, and you'll never be the same.
Slaughtered. Wiped the floor with 'em and  not only that, the money was unbelievable.
